name: Team Mystic
description: The leader of Team Mystic, Blanche, studies Pokemon evolution and claims they cannot lose with their utilization of calm analysis.

name: Team Valor
description: Team Valor is lead by the Candela, who values training and strength. Candela is researching ways to enhance Pokemon's natural power as she tries to find true strength.

name: Team Instinct
description: Team Instinct is led by Spark, who believes you will never lose when you trust your instincts. Spark studies Pokemon's intuition, and thinks that it's related to how Pokemon are hatched.
